p: We used the dengue incidence data and Google search frequency data from [ 56] which is given for 5 countries/states: Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, Brazil, and Mexico. Out-of-sample monthly estimates of dengue case counts were obtained for all methods and their performance was assessed over the following time periods [ 43]. Singapore: February 2008 to August 2015; Taiwan: January 2013 to March 2016; Thailand: October 2010 to August 2015; Brazil: March 2006 to December 2012; Mexico: March 2006 to August 2015.
